info.title: Words API
info.description: Words API lets you retrieve information about English words, including definitions, synonyms, rhymes, pronunciation, syllables, and frequency of usage. It also can tell you about relationships between words, for instance that “math” has categories like “algebra” and “geometry”, or that a “finger” is part of a “hand”.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word to search synonyms for.

get.description: Get definitions of a word, including the part of speech.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word to search the definitions for.

definition: lovable especially in a childlike or naive way
a very pretty girl who works as a photographer's model
appealing to the emotions as well as the eye

expectedResponse.body: {"word":"lovely","definition":["lovable especially in a childlike or naive way","a very pretty girl who works as a photographer's model","appealing to the emotions as well as the eye"]}

x-unitTests.x-testDescription: Get definitions of a word, including the part of speech.

get.description: How to pronounce a word, according to the International Phonetic Alphabet. May include multiple results if the word is pronounced differently depending on its part of speech.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word to search pronunciation for.

x-unitTests.x-testDescription: How to pronounce a word, according to the International Phonetic Alphabet. May include multiple results if the word is pronounced differently depending on its part of speech.

get.description: Retrieve information about a word. Results can include definitions, part of speech, synonyms, related words, syllables, and pronunciation. This method is useful to see which relationships are attached to which definition and part of speech of a word.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: This is a template parameter that is used to provide the word, about which the information is being fetched.

results.definition: raise or haul up with or as if with mechanical help
catch the scent of; get wind of
a reflex that expels intestinal gas through the anus
form into a wreath
empty rhetoric or insincere or exaggerated talk
examples: that's a lot of wind

results.definition: arrange or or coil around
to move or cause to move in a sinuous, spiral, or circular course
examples: the river winds through the hills

results.definition: extend in curves and turns
examples: The road winds around the lake

results.definition: the act of winding or twisting
examples: he put the key in the old clock and gave it a good wind

results.definition: a musical instrument in which the sound is produced by an enclosed column of air that is moved by bellows or the human breath
air moving (sometimes with considerable force) from an area of high pressure to an area of low pressure
examples: trees bent under the fierce winds
when there is no wind, row

results.definition: coil the spring of (some mechanical device) by turning a stem
examples: wind your watch

results.definition: an indication of potential opportunity
a tendency or force that influences events
examples: the winds of change

results.definition: breath
examples: the collision knocked the wind out of him

x-unitTests.x-testDescription: Retrieve information about a word. Results can include definitions, part of speech, synonyms, related words, syllables, and pronunciation. This method is useful to see which relationships are attached to which definition and part of speech of a word.

get.description: Get examples of how the word is used.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word to search the examples for.

examples: there are laboratories for commercial testing
it involved testing thousands of children for smallpox
they agreed to end the testing of atomic weapons

expectedResponse.body: {"word":"testing","examples":["there are laboratories for commercial testing","it involved testing thousands of children for smallpox","they agreed to end the testing of atomic weapons"]}

x-unitTests.x-testDescription: Get examples of how the word is used.

get.description: Expands upon the frequency score returned by the main /words/{word} endpoint. Returns zipf, a score indicating how common the word is in the English language, with a range of 1 to 7; per Million, the number of times the word is likely to appear in a corpus of one million English words; and diversity, a 0-1 scale the shows the likelihood of the word appearing in an English document that is part of a corpus.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word to search frequency for.

x-unitTests.x-testDescription: Expands upon the frequency score returned by the main /words/{word} endpoint. Returns zipf, a score indicating how common the word is in the English language, with a range of 1 to 7; per Million, the number of times the word is likely to appear in a corpus of one million English words; and diversity, a 0-1 scale the shows the likelihood of the word appearing in an English document that is part of a corpus.

DefinitionsResponse.title: DefinitionsResponse

definition.description: The definitions of the searched word.
example: lovable especially in a childlike or naive way
a very pretty girl who works as a photographer's model
appealing to the emotions as well as the eye

DefinitionsResponse.description: This custom type contains response for definitions endpoint.

definition: lovable especially in a childlike or naive way
a very pretty girl who works as a photographer's model
appealing to the emotions as well as the eye

ExamplesResponse.title: ExamplesResponse

examples.description: The usage examples of the searched word.
example: there are laboratories for commercial testing
it involved testing thousands of children for smallpox
they agreed to end the testing of atomic weapons

ExamplesResponse.description: This custom type contains response for examples endpoint.

examples: there are laboratories for commercial testing
it involved testing thousands of children for smallpox
they agreed to end the testing of atomic weapons

PronunciationDetails.title: PronunciationDetails

noun.description: The noun pronunciation of the word.

verb.description: The verb pronunciation of the word.

PronunciationDetails.description: This model contains pronunciation details of a specific word.

SynonymsResponse.title: SynonymsResponse

synonyms.description: The synonyms of the searched word.

SynonymsResponse.description: This custom type contains response for synonyms endpoint.

FrequencyResponse.title: FrequencyResponse
FrequencyResponse.description: This custom type contains response for frequency endpoint.

WordDetails.title: WordDetails

definition.description: Explains the definition of the word.
definition.example: an examination of the characteristics of something.

partOfSpeech.description: Explains what part of speech the word is.

typeOf.description: List of words that are more general than the searched word.

hasTypes.description: More specific examples of types of searched word.

examples.description: The usage examples of word if any.
example: there are laboratories for commercial testing
it involved testing thousands of children for smallpox

antonyms.description: List of antonyms for the searched word.

verbGroup.description: The verb group of the searched word.

hasParts.description: Words that are parts of the searched word.

hasSubstances.description: Words that are substances of the searched word.

entails.description: Words that are implied by the searched word. Usually used for verbs.

WordDetails.description: This custom type stores word information.

example.definition: coil the spring of (some mechanical device) by turning a stem
examples: wind your watch

WordResponse.title: WordResponse

results.description: This field contains detailed information of the word.

example.definition: the act of giving students or candidates a test (as by questions) to determine what they know or have learned
an examination of the characteristics of something
examples: there are laboratories for commercial testing
it involved testing thousands of children for smallpox

example.definition: the act of subjecting to experimental test in order to determine how well something works
examples: they agreed to end the testing of atomic weapons

frequency.description: The frequency of the word usage.

WordResponse.description: This custom type contains the response for word API.
